action.action-desc: Mr. Rutherford (for himself, Mr. Katko, Mr. Stauber, Mr. Nehls, and Ms. Malliotakis) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to provide for law enforcement officer bonuses.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Communities Deserve Cops Act.
Subsection (b) of section 1701 of title I of the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 (34 U.S.C. 10381) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in paragraph (22), by striking and at the end;
in paragraph (23), by striking the period at the end and inserting a semicolon; and
by adding at the end the following:
to provide a signing bonus for a law enforcement officer in an amount not to exceed $5,000; and
to provide a retention bonus for a law enforcement officer in an amount not to exceed $5,000.
